document.full_text: u.s. chipmaker intel announced "multi-million" investments in two russian online firms on thursday, in a fresh sign of investor confidence in growth prospects of internet businesses.
document.title: intel invests in two russian internet firms
lines_and_colors: u.s. chipmaker intel announced "multi-million" investments in two russian online firms on thursday, in a fresh sign of investor confidence in growth prospects of internet businesses.
